Name: Youtube
Description: A free video sharing website that makes it easy to watch online videos.
Platforms: smartphone tablet streaming media device smart TV laptop

Name: Netflix
Description: A pay television over-the-top media service that offers subscription-based video on demand from a library of films and television series.
Platforms: smart TV smartphone tablet streaming media player game console laptop

Name: Roblox
Description: Online game platform that allows users to program games and play games created by other users
Platforms: game console streaming media player smartphone tablet

Name: Soundcloud
Description: Stream and listen online for free with over 265 million tracks

Name: Spotify
Description: Stream music and podcasts you love.

Name: Snapchat
Description: A popular messaging app that lets users exchange pictures and videos that are meant to disappear after they're viewed.

Name: Instagram
Description: A free social networking service built around sharing photos and videos.

Name: Canvas
Description: A course management system that supports online learning and teaching.
